snippet: In a conflict of personalization and privacy, personalization has triumphed.
abstract: Apple chief executive Timothy D Cook and General Electric chief executive Jeffrey Immelt discuss how future business technology will enhance personalized machines and collaboration tools.
lead_paragraph: In a conflict of personalization and privacy, personalization has triumphed.

headline.main: A View Emerges of Business Technology’s Future as the Personalization of the Machine
headline.print_headline: A View Emerges of Business Technology’s Future as the Personalization of the Machine
